Posts.Content: Jan 8, 2010 09:42PM Tripleneg65 wrote: Well, I'm new to this site but I saw the "game" and was disgusted. It's too bad that people find "fun" with others that are suffering. It seems that jokes and fun are poked at peopleÂ  and no one really thinks about the outcome. I did not respond--and I did not send it on to my friends. I think if we want to do something we should tell all of the "bra posters" to send $10 to the Breast Cancer research or projects in their areas so that we can increase the services to help find a cure. Maybe they will find themselves "color blind"!!!!
Posts.Title: Hiding over here while the rocks fly my way... Running_Violet kim40
